title: PowerSchool Breach Data Review
description: The table below contains the information about you that was improperly accessed and exported from PowerSchool in December 2024.
description2: All data accessed is present - any blank values are intentional and indicate that there was no information stored in that field for a particular individual, not that data is missing.
description3: This report was generated using a snapshot of the database taken the day of the incident. It does not reflect any changes made since that point.
